name: Cybernetic Eye, Thermal Viewer (TL-16)
description:
The thermal viewer cybernetic eye uses an advanced form of passive infrared (ANI visual bands). The thermal viewer eye has a range of 400 meters and can clearly see through most forms of smoke, but is affected by rain or snow. This version of the cybernetic eye is single-function eye and looks more like a natural, unaltered eye.

In all cases, the cyber eye also includes basic visible light vision. For Sophonts with different visual ranges the basic cyber eye will cover their normal visual range.

The thermal viewer cybernetic eye is also referred to as a high resolution thermal (HRT) cybernetic eye.
